title: Beautiful 2 Bedroom 2 Bath  Apartment Located in the Mission District!
posting_body: ['Beautiful 2 Bedroom Apartment Located in the Mission District!', 'Property Address', '480 Potrero Ave,  | San Francisco, CA 94110', 'Offered By', 'Atlas Property Group | <URL>', 'Description', '1st MONTH FREE!', 'Living at 480 Potrero puts you in the middle of everything San Francisco has to offer.', 'Located close to the lively Mission District, restaurants, breweries, and bars offer weekly entertainment within walking distance.', 'The building is a minute walk from a major coffee hub, and retailers such as Safeway, 24-Hour Fitness, and Whole Foods Market.', 'Need to go further?', 'The 101 freeway is conveniently close as well as a bus stop situated outside.', 'Our apartments were thoughtfully designed with you in mind: a little eclectic, a touch sophisticated and a lot of personality.', 'From expertly crafted design, refined finishes and an intuitive layout.', 'Make 480 Potrero your new home today!', 'Walk Score 96', 'Transit Score 80', 'Bikers Score 91', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 2BD/2.0BA', 'Square Feet: 800', 'Rental Terms', 'Available: Now', 'Security Deposit: $1,000.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Small dogs allowed']
